title: Leg of lamb in hay with lavender
description: This unusual approach to roast lamb is very simple and results in tender, aromatic meat perfect for Sunday lunch. The hay needed is available from pet shops - ask for ‘eating’ hay that’s edible for horses.
ingredients: 1 small handful lavender, preferably freshly picked
50g/2oz butter, softened, plus an extra knob for the broccoli
10 King Edward potatoes, peeled and cut into 2 or 3 pieces
1 large bunch fresh mint leaves, finely chopped
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
